ui.publicForgotPassword.title: Reset your password
ui.publicForgotPassword.description: Enter the email you use to access Poetry and we will send reset instructions.
ui.publicForgotPassword.email.label: Email address
ui.publicForgotPassword.submit.label: Send reset link
ui.publicForgotPassword.error: We could not process your request. Try again soon.
ui.publicForgotPassword.success: Check your inbox for the reset link.
